title: The Rosary, Divine Mercy Chaplet, Traditional Prayers, and more
description:
America's #1 Rosary recording is easy to pray with every day and a sublime tool for learning the Rosary. Beautiful voices draw you into prayer with perfect pacing and no distracting music. Includes Luminous Mysteries. Bonus Features: Common Catholic Prayers and the History of the Rosary. The ideal gift for family, friends, or parish.

00:00:00 - Introduction
00:00:40 - The Rosary
00:20:40 - The Chaplet of Divine Mercy
00:27:00 - The Memorare
00:27:35 - Prayer to St. Michael the Archangel
00:28:00 - Prayer to Your Guardian Angel
00:28:15 - Morning Offering
00:28:40 - A Brief History of the Rosary
00:32:20 - "The Truth About Mary" talk with Marcus Grodi and Patrick Madrid
01:10:40 - Conclusion
01:12:04 - Previews of other free CDs available from the Mary Foundation

---

There is a good reason why this free CD is the most popular Rosary recording in America. It's easy to pray along with, and easy to pray along with every day.

Years ago, there were several popular Rosary recordings on the market. Many featured beautiful songs, special prayers, and inspirational meditations. They were quite lengthy and usually cost $15 and $20 each. Nice, but not very practical.

Our version is a simple voice recording (only 17 minutes in length) and it exploded in popularity. Every year, year after year, it's the most popular recording we distribute. This is because it's the perfect "every day" rosary recording. There are no extra prayers or distracting music. It features pleasant male and female voices at a normal paceÃ¢â‚¬â€œneither ponderous nor rushed.

It's pretty much the best Rosary you can own for a daily commute in the car to work or on your way to pick up the kids from school. It's perfect for your kitchen or workshop. It makes the Family Rosary much easier for the little ones.

And it's a wonderful gift for teaching others to pray the Rosary. So when you order free copies for yourself and your family, consider getting extras for your friends, fellow parishioners, and coworkers.
